name: The mobile application for 4PET - The social network for your pet.
description: 4PET is a social network for pet lovers. We focus on improving our users' daily experiences, like sharing moments, stories, photos, videos, etc with pets. We develop a pet rescue feature in situations of danger and help them find a new family. In the near future, we will launch a new coin based on Blockchain technology. 4PET will be a pet-specific universe, anything about pets.
